Description:
Verify that items from the personal toolbar folder are properly
      added/deleted.
Verify that there are no 'dead' default links.
Verify that disclosure triangles/folder icons are in sync.

Change the name of a bookmark without use of the bookmark properties
      dialog.

Determine whether extremely large images can be copied from web
      pages.

Determine whether text can be copied and pasted from text fields
      within a dialog box.

Determine if the application and OS properly
      handle items dragged from the Bookmark Manager

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on
      the form itself.

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Feature: Edit Form Data - new value for field
Description:
Verify that if you add a new value for a field in Form Manager
      it is later offered as an option when prefilling a form using
      this field.

Verify that there is an in Index of help content and a list of
        keywords to links in the help content.

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problme "if you
        can't see anyone in your buddy list window."
Verify the functionality of the forward/back buttons in Help

Determine whether Mail and News help content displays
        correctly
Determine whether Streamlined Interface displays correctly
Determine whether the Security Center displays correctly

Verify that double-clicking on a history link causes it to be
        launched in a browser window.
Verify that columns are resizable to show/hide more of entries

Feature: Back and forward with named anchors
Description:
Verify browser goes back and forward correctly from sites that use
        named anchors

Determine whether images load directly into the web browser from a
        networked server.
Determine whether a page with frames prints properly
Determine if a page with indentations prints as seen on screen
Determine if tables print correctly
Determine that off-line printing works

Verify that Personal and Navigation bars can be expanded and
        collapsed
